msContents.summary: Report of proceedings: the villagers were summoned before the procurator; the subject is money and grain taxes

div.ab: (Column I) Year 8, Pharmouthi 27 in Antaioupolis before the bema. Theophanes summoned those from the village of Aphrodite. When Besarion son of Besarion and Besarion son of Horos and ...on son of Sarapion and Besarion alias ... son of ... and Besi... [son of ... and ...] son of Bassos and Di[... son of ...] and Sarapion [son of ...] and Besarion son of [...] alias Isidoros had been summoned and responded, Theophanes the procurator said to them: "Our most illustrious prefect . . . those of the metropolis . . ."
